action.action-desc: Mr. Francis Rooney of Florida (for himself, Mr. Smith of Texas, Mr. Brooks of Alabama, Mr. Farenthold, Mr. DesJarlais, Mr. Budd, and Mr. Norman) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to alter the deadlines by which an application for asylum must be made, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Asylum Protection Act of 2018.
Section 208(a)(2) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1158(a)(2)) is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking 1 year and inserting 30 days; and

by adding before the period at the end the following: , except that, in the case of an alien who arrives at a designated port of arrival, that alien shall be required to commence an application at the time of arrival.
